document.heading: Janice Wade McCree Way Designation Act of 2016
To symbolically designate the 700 block of 24th Street, N.E., as Janice Wade McCree Way.

history.summary: BILL SUMMARY - As introduced, this bill designates the 700 block of 24th Street, N.E., in Ward 5, as Janice Wade McCree Way.

document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Janice Wade McCree Way Designation Act of 2016".

section.text: Pursuant to sections 401, 403a, and 423 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01, 9-204.03a, and 9-204.23), the Council symbolically designates the 700 block of 24th Street, N.E., as "Janice Wade McCree Way".

codify:street-designation-anno.action: the Council symbolically designates the 700 block of 24th Street, N.E., as "Janice Wade McCree Way

section.heading: Transmittal.
section.text: The Council shall transmit a copy of this act, upon its effective date, to the Director of the District Department of Transportation.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), a 30-day period of congressional review asprovided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code § 1-206.02(c)(1)), and publication in the District of Columbia Register.
